item.title: Contact Me
item.description:
If you need to get hold of me, email is preferable; it's the only mode of communication I reliably check.

Missives sent to this email address will be checked the same day. If you have another email address for me, it's deprecated from this point on.

I strongly prefer that anything you send me be encrypted; my public key is here. If you can sign it as well, even better.

James Duerden Mr. James F.
